new_features.whats_new: Updated dependency management for improved functionality.
new_features.impact: Allows the latest features from third-party services to enhance performance.
new_features.changes_description: Upgraded the 'request' library to the latest version to ensure compatibility with new features.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Fixed run times for ClickHouse tests.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Adjusted runtime environments for better compatibility with ClickHouse Cloud.
Cleaned up outdated migration settings that were no longer in use.

bug_fixes.impact: Enhanced the organization of published images.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Updated image naming conventions for clarity and consistency.

tests.changes_description: Implemented tests to verify the functioning of ClickHouse with Cloud services.

documentation.whats_new: Updated to use Git tags in Docker publishing.
documentation.changes_description: Removed the semantic version tag system for Docker, simplifying the naming conventions.

new_features.impact: Improved reliability and performance in testing scenarios.
new_features.changes_description: Updated the testing framework to run against ClickHouse Cloud, allowing for a more thorough validation.
The Docker publish will now use the git tag name as the Docker tag, streamlining releases.

bug_fixes.changes_description: The migration flag was removed to simplify the deployment configuration.

bug_fixes.whats_new: Fixed issues with current runs in ClickHouse tests.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Adjusted the configurations to optimize concurrent runs for the tests to improve reliability.

bug_fixes.impact: Cleaned up image identifiers for easier management.
bug_fixes.changes_description: Images published will no longer include the unnecessary prefix for clarity.

tests.whats_new: Executed ClickHouse tests against the established ClickHouse Cloud.
tests.changes_description: Run ClickHouse tests to verify functionality against the cloud setup, enhancing validation confidence.

documentation.impact: Customers will find it easier to understand deployment.
documentation.changes_description: Doc now clarifies how to use git tag for Docker tagging.

others.impact: Marks the addition of several updates and fixes.
others.changes_description: Finalized version number for stability and feature set release.
